website_summaries.verdict: If you know people who like gag gifts, this makes a good one.
pros: It's hard to not crack a smile when you see the little men on the umbrella
Maad's model is fun and moderately functional
cons: Not made from quality plastic, some users complain about lack of durability

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute item!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very cute umbrella! Not sure if it’s up to the challenge as a primary umbrella though. The plastic snap to hold the wrap around to close it is cheap and it pops open on its own at times. And when you open it be ready because it’s like boom, ready! It startled me it was so powerful. I did give it 5 stars because the umbrella itself seems pretty solid. Plus it’s just a fun way to make you smile when it’s raining out. I’ve gotten so many compliments on it. It’s very whimsical and I’m certain I’ll enjoy it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: atagirl

customer_reviews.title: Keeps rain off head but not body
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes the coverage of umbrella but the closing gets stuck and can be aggravating when closing. Need to edit after two months: 1. Wife said the way the umbrella works that it drops water down the middle of her back, so this model is not large enough for her to use. 2. The products arms bent and pulled away from the cover after wife opened one day using umbrella after work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute however unnecessarily large packaging aside, there was no need to place a sticker DIRECTLY on this very flimsy plastic. Now trying to remove the sticker is ruining the umbrella. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen matthess

customer_reviews.title: Great White Elephant Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gift for an upcoming Christmas Party and am SO excited to see who gets it! It is so cute, I almost just want to keep it for myself. Seems to be pretty study, though I haven't tried it out for myself in any rain or heavy wind. I didn't even look at the handle in the photos before I bought it, I was surprised to see that it was a cute little hook handle. Hangs up easily on a coat rack, closet or door handle.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Watson

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friends 35th bday haha. She is single and always reading to mingle so... I thought getting her this "raining men" umbrella was fitting. Shape is adorable, print is fun and silly, and it still has usability. I love it! What a perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Darling Item
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and cute product. This is darling but not that sturdy. The plastic it is made out of is a little thin. That said, I collect umbrellas and I spend a lot of money on umbrellas and for the price this is fine for me. I will also say the people always spot this one in my collection and they smile.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Item broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a Christmas gift. It rained yesterday and the gift recipient used it and the stem broke on the day of first use. The item is extremely cute and we had high hopes but it is made very poorly.
customer_reviews.author: R_T

customer_reviews.title: Success at white elephant gift exchange
customer_reviews.text: For my family's holiday white elephant gift exchange, I combined this umbrella with a tee shirt that said 'It's Raining Men, Hallelujah!' and some buff men wine glass markers called 'Drinking Buddies'. I was impressed with the quality of the umbrella though, and a lot of people wanted it! It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: rachealmarieb

customer_reviews.title: It's Raining Men!
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for being super cute. It was a gift for a coworker and she loved it. Cant speak for durability but it is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Useful Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute and useful umbrella! I’m using as basis for my Halloween costume but I’ll use it later to keep the rain out. Great umbrella and very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Coni Moore

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella. I used it as a white elephant gift at Christmas and I was hoping I would actually end up with it but sadly I did not. I may just buy myself one. I think its hilarious. And it's big so it should definitely keep you dry.
customer_reviews.author: KARA Jones

customer_reviews.title: So many laughs.
customer_reviews.text: So many laughs but more a novelty. Won't hold up unless it's a light drizzle or heavy mist. Not much coverage, my face gets rained on and perhaps the design of the handle could use a little improvement but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Bo Bina

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella has a great dome, no rain getting in. And i love the smiles you get from the observant people you pass and sometimes you even see someone break into song (raining men) - it is great in these dark times.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Cute & Original. Brightens Up A Gloomy Day!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that could make this umbrella better is if it was a little lighter & had a retractable handle/pole somehow (which I know is impossible for these types of umbrellas). The pattern is very cute, good sized (you do have to be pretty close to tell what the pattern is though, so I would actually like it if it was printed a bit larger). Heavy weight & most important--waterproof/no leaks (yet! fingers crossed!)
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: great style functionality could be improved breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: great style functionality could be improved breaks easily. also easy to fix but it shouldnt break that easily. come on umbrella makers.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Cute umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gag gift. Ended up winning it back at the party. Its a nice little Umbrella! I like that it is more of a shape of a bowl so if it’s windy out it keeps the rain away more.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Although the umbrella is so cute and fun it starts to fall apart after 3 or 4th ...
customer_reviews.text: Although the umbrella is so cute and fun, it starts to fall apart after 3rd or 4th use. Just for light rainy days. A moderate storm or gust of wind will start to break the spines. Super expensive for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: MichellemyBelle

customer_reviews.title: Broke upon first use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but it literally broke in half when I tried to open it. ☹️ The pole was not sturdy at all. Adorable pattern but poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great white elephant gift! Feels and looks a little less well made than I had expected. Not too sure how long it will last, but it is functional.
customer_reviews.author: HisLilLady09

customer_reviews.title: BEST GIFT!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to a friend who turned 30 and is an office manager, her staff and friends loved it! She looks so chic and it's a conversation starter for all eyes on her. A fabulous umbrella for a fabulous friend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Paripurana

customer_reviews.title: A fun conversation starter umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: This was a white elephant gift at Christmas. Well all the ladies were fighting to get it cuz it was so dang cute. Some of them wanted to know where I got it from and ordered it on line for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this a gag gift, to be honest I somewhat expected it to be dinky and more for laughs. But it is actually a really awesome umbrella! So on top of the laughs it is being used for it's original purpose of protecting ones hair from the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fun umbrella!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella and so so all of my friends. Some have ordered it themselves. Only thing I wish Is that it were a bit larger in size but it’s not too small where I feel silly carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Soder

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is so cute and fun. I worry the plastic will melt if left in the car, it feels a little cheap. But it's cute!
customer_reviews.author: liz Nicks

customer_reviews.title: Funny and fun umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the xmas white elephant gift! had everyone cracking up! It was a great product to gift, I had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gricelda Covarrubias

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Cute umbrella! I gave it away as a white elephant gift. It was a hit with the ladies. Every tried to win it!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Novelty
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a novelty. Made from cheap plastic (similar to an inflatable toy). Do not anticipate it lasting a season.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Funny yet functional!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a White Elephant Christmas Game present andbit was a total hit. Everyone loved the pun and thought it was perfect! Stolen many times during he game. I worked well for its purpose and wasn’t damaged! I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Haley Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious for a woman who has everything
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend that changes her umbrella with outfits lol she loved it. Absolutely hilarious and a conversation piece
customer_reviews.author: Busymommy

customer_reviews.title: It’s raining men! Hallelujah!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a white elephant gift and it was a hit! Had so much fun seeing family members stealing it for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Rainy Day Joy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift and loved it so much I'll be purchasing another for myself this spring ☔ The transparency and illustrations instantly brighten rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: BrandiB

customer_reviews.title: Great white elephant gift
customer_reviews.text: This was the hit of my office white elephant party! Everyone loved it including the person recieving it. We had lots of laughs because of it. Great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Super great gift idea and very nice and sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Teeny LEE

customer_reviews.title: Fun Umbrella ☔️
customer_reviews.text: A quality umbrella ☂. With a fun theme. The shell is clear which helps seeing through the umbrella 🌂. The pattern is properly spaced to help not obstruct with your view.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This is SO cute but it was much smaller than I thought it'd be. The opening was enough to cover a person but if you had a backpack on it wouldn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality umbrella🌂
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella was a hit at my white elephant party. The girls loved it. Will definitely order these every year!
customer_reviews.author: AD41

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, functional conversation starter
customer_reviews.text: Turns a rainy day to a fun day. Can't use it without singing the song. Very cute and strong, too.
customer_reviews.author: Tester Family

customer_reviews.title: Great white elephant gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a white elephant gift for a ladies group, they all wanted it!
customer_reviews.author: jfed

customer_reviews.title: ... coworker and it’s really cute and seems to be good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Biught this for a coworker and it’s really cute and seems to be good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Beanie Bikini

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for your bestie!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is a hoot! Great fun and good quality! I bought it as a birthday gift for my bestie and we couldn't stop laughing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute not functional
customer_reviews.text: The clasp used to close the umbrella is poorly made and stretches out after 3-4 uses before becoming completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best White Elephant Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a great white elephant gift. It got stolen many times and it was a favorite item. Also, its a nice, usable umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: R. F.

customer_reviews.title: The only way this umbrella would be cuter is if it actually played "It's Raining Men"...LOL!
customer_reviews.text: Really brightens up a rainy day...only way it would be cuter is if it actually played "It's Raining Men"...LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Adams

customer_reviews.title: So cute but didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so freaking much but unfortunately it only lasted a little over a year before it broke
customer_reviews.author: D M

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and material is good.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for someone and wanted to keep it myself! Very cute and material is good.
customer_reviews.author: Talin

customer_reviews.title: Cute, lightweight and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE cutest umbrella I have ever owned! Not only that, but it is a great size without feeling heavy to hold when in use. HIGHLY RECOMMEND <3
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn L Masters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Few things in life bring me more joy than this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Micayla Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Really a fun but useful item
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift for the white elephant gift exchange at my party. It was such a big hit and was stolen a few times. Really a fun but useful item.
customer_reviews.author: Starlight220

customer_reviews.title: Great white elephant gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella!! Got many laughs and the person who has it gets lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: mindy heilman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent white elephant gift
customer_reviews.text: Love the umbrella Judy not sure how durable it’s gonna be over time
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit at company christmas party
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a white elephant gift at my company christmas party. All the women were fighting over this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse M.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is super cute! I almost wish it would rain more so that I could use it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Salimi

customer_reviews.title: I love when it rains now
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is perfect for two reasons: 1. its hilarious and 2. your husband will never steal it.
customer_reviews.author: Toots

customer_reviews.title: Good produlct
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 78 year old mother. She loved it . Good quality and opens easily
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: This was better then I thought
customer_reviews.text: This was better then I thought. I bought it for a white elephant party and everyone wanted it. I think I'm going to order myself one. It's so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie F.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Loved by everyone who has received. Quality product. Color is clear. Handle is clear.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke R Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my friend and she absolutely adored it!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Young

customer_reviews.title: Arrived bent and broken
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella arrived bent and two of the spokes are crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the little men on this. Was a funny gift to my mother because she loves clear umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Rainz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for ME! I get some many compliments and asking where i got it!
customer_reviews.author: EHunt

customer_reviews.title: Curved top
customer_reviews.text: It curves at the top. Not sure if supposed to be that way .... it does open and close fine. But overall I love it. Just hope doesn’t mean it’s gonna break soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Harty

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Such a great gift for Christmastime. Always a hit with everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Hilarious Umbrella used as a white elephant gift.. might buy myself one too.
customer_reviews.author: molly k james

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but easily broken.
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a week and barely used. It’s very cute but not of value.
customer_reviews.author: mo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible purchase that broke in less than 1-1/2 months
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had this umbrella for 1-1/2 months and it has come loose from the ends that holds the plastic in place.
customer_reviews.author: AMY SOUTH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its so cute! My 22 year old daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Souza

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is cute and funny but 2 of the spokes broke upon the first time using it. Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey abrecht

customer_reviews.title: Received for Christmas gift. Works perfectly and makes me ...
customer_reviews.text: Received for Christmas gift. Works perfectly and makes me laugh every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: robert r mcburney

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it so much
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this umbrella for my "Stingy Santa" gift for a work Christmas party. I LOVE it so much...I'm keeping it for myself. :)
customer_reviews.author: Father

customer_reviews.title: Hilarious
customer_reviews.text: Best christmas gift I have ever bought someone! Looks exactly like the picture.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. So funny while still managing to be useful!
customer_reviews.author: DClivin

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly as shown and it made for a ...
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as shown and it made for a hilarious gift! Some of the men are in suits, some look a bit hipster, and some are in speedos lol

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product!!! Not like described!
customer_reviews.text: Wrong product didn't have men on it it was bottles of alcohol!

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Niece and she loves it. It's big, sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella Love
customer_reviews.text: The young lady for whom this was bought thought it was a hoot.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Laubach

product_meta.title: Raining Men Clear Bubble Dome Umbrella - Perfect White Elephant Gift, or Birthday Gift
product_meta.description:
Bring some sunshine to your rainy day! How many times has your automatic umbrella failed you during that downpour and left you in the rain? Our manual design allows for you to release the bottom spring for easy gliding when opening and closing. The tie includes an easy snap to wrap your umbrella is ready to be put away for another day. The beautiful acrylic handle provides your hands with comfort.

Quality, Practicality, and Happiness all wrapped into one gift! Why have it rain cats and dogs when it can be raining men? This umbrella makes the perfect gift for the special someone you have in mind! Watch their face light up as they open their new favorite necessity.

Buy with confidence. We provide each and every customer with a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. If you are not satisfied for any reason, just let us know and we are happy to give you a full refund.

There is truly nothing to loose! Click "Add To Cart" now!
feature_bullets: TRANSPARENT CANOPY - The clear bubble dome design measures roughly 30" wide x 31.5" tall. Let the semi-automatic gliding design open and close your umbrella with ease.
PERFECT HOLIDAY GIFT - This umbrella is perfect for gift for her (or him!) for birthdays, holidays, anniversaries and more!
WINDPROOF DESIGN - The bubble dome design allows for the most coverage and protection from even the worst downpours.
MAKE IT RAIN MEN - Who isn't going to love this on their rainy day? Cheer up people passing by or give yourself a laugh while you stay dry!
At MAAD BRANDS, we so sure of the quality of our products, we offer a “No Questions Asked” 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. If you aren’t happy for any reason, we will immediately give you a refund.
